bibl.title: Particle-usage in Documentary Papyri (I-IV A.D.): An Integrated Sociolinguistically-informed Approach.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The corpus: Post-classical documentary papyri [focuses on letters and petitions from archives of the I-IV cent. A.D.]. - 3. The socio-linguistic framework. - 4. Analysis of particle-usage. - 5. Concluding remarks. - Appendix: Archives studied. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Klaas Bentein, Particle-usage in Documentary Papyri (I-IV A.D.): An Integrated Sociolinguistically-informed Approach.
